Question: In March 2011, this person released her seventh studio album Femme Fatale.
Hints: The same year, this person embarked on the Oops!..
Its lead single, "Womanizer", became this person's first number one in the Billboard Hot 100 since "...Baby One More Time".
In June 1997, this person was in talks with manager Lou Pearlman to join the female pop group Innosense.
